extendedInfo.description: As the proud national airline of South Africa and member of the Star Alliance, this app is another touch point in making your experience of traveling with South African Airways a world class one ensuring you travel in award winning style and comfort. Search by departure city or read up our destination guides to some of the most exciting destinations in the world including our very own Cape Town and Johannesburg. Features: -View my Booking View Your Booking information -Check In Check in on your mobile device -Voyager miles View Your Voyager Status and miles -Lounge Finder View information on South African Airways lounges -Specials View special fares -Flight Schedule Access to information about South African Airways upcoming flights. -Flight Status Find the updated status of any South African Airways flight. -Destination Information View information on destinations that South African Airways flies to. -Weather Get current and updated 10 day forecast of the weather at any destination that South African Airways flies to -Currency Converter Check the currency of the country you are flying to -Baggage Trace Find the status of your checked in luggage -Cargo Track and Trace Track your SAA Cargo shipment every step of the way "Bringing the World to Africa,taking Africa to the World"

reviews.title: Nees to play with it more
reviews.comment: For those cpmplaining that check in is slow, only the 1st time ahould be slow. Your phone will cache certain images that will make things load faster in future. Also depends on your network connection.
reviews.author: Werner Stipp

reviews.title: Don\'t bother
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your time, can\'t enter booking reference/e-ticket number in provided field.
reviews.author: Grant Hilhorst

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Bulky slow interface. Not able to enter my surname in booking check as app does not recognise a space as an alphabetic value. Can be a very useful app but not world standard as of yet.
reviews.author: Etienne van Ellewee

reviews.title: Needs some major updates
reviews.comment: After logging in with surname and voyger number, it neess to log your details, so that the next time you open the app it doesn\'t ask for you details again. Very annoying.
reviews.author: Schalk Greyling

reviews.title: 5 star
reviews.comment: Really nice app.Just gotta get used to it;)
reviews.author: 5577umbrella

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Feature set is primitive. Lacks a builtin boarding pass.
reviews.author: Tertius Hyman

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Saa you are the best Easy and efficient
reviews.author: Farouk Mahomed

reviews.title: Boarding pass feature lacking
reviews.comment: Be great if it allowed 2 view boarding passes for security and gate clearance.
reviews.author: Timon Austin

reviews.title: Amazing look
reviews.comment: Very smart looking app. It\'s a shame I can\'t book flights using the app.
reviews.author: Yusuf Mayet

reviews.title: Better
reviews.comment: Pliz enable the booking, we are unable to book using the app.
reviews.author: Locaster Msiska

reviews.title: Xtremely poor
reviews.comment: Not good. Do not install. Crashes every time. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Terence Bloem

reviews.title: Check in\'s now a breeze
reviews.comment: Love the fact that I can now check in using the app! Here I come Rest of Africa!
reviews.author: Kristel Sampson

reviews.title: Nice looking app
reviews.comment: Installed perfectly. Nice features but I wish I could book as well.
reviews.author: Pieter Snyman
